about_the_game:
Endless Waves Survival is an adrenaline-fueled endless survival game. Fight a continuous onslaught of enemies and claim upgrades and new abilities as you level up. How long will you survive the next run?

Fight a battle that never ends

Fight against a relentless stream of enemies and build your strongest character! Endless Waves Survival features elements of roguelike and bullet hell

Figure out the strongest builds

Your objective is to survive for as long as possible and figure out which abilities and upgrades give you the best chance of survival, or make you totally OP! You can play as a range of characters with unique attacks and base stats.

Pick up loot items for the shop

There is the chance to pick up loot throughout the game, which unlocks more items to buy in the shop. You can activate these potions and buffs in your next game to give you a greater chance of surviving for longer than your previous run.

Everything stacks:

All items, spells and potions stack. That means there is no limit to how powerful you can become.

Features

  • Play as a mage, knight, rogue, or archer
  • Fight against an endless horde of enemies
  • Upgrade your character as the waves intensify
  • Buy items in the shop to increase your survivability

About the Game

Endless Waves Survival is an adrenaline-fueled endless survival game. Fight a continuous onslaught of enemies and claim upgrades and new abilities as you level up. How long will you survive the next run?

Fight a battle that never ends

Fight against a relentless stream of enemies and build your strongest character! Endless Waves Survival features elements of roguelike and bullet hell

Figure out the strongest builds

Your objective is to survive for as long as possible and figure out which abilities and upgrades give you the best chance of survival, or make you totally OP! You can play as a range of characters with unique attacks and base stats.

Pick up loot items for the shop

There is the chance to pick up loot throughout the game, which unlocks more items to buy in the shop. You can activate these potions and buffs in your next game to give you a greater chance of surviving for longer than your previous run.

Everything stacks:

All items, spells and potions stack. That means there is no limit to how powerful you can become.

Features

  • Play as a mage, knight, rogue, or archer
  • Fight against an endless horde of enemies
  • Upgrade your character as the waves intensify
  • Buy items in the shop to increase your survivability

  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
